Token.Abstract: @brief This protocol defines delegate methods for NSAImageWell objects.
@brief Asks the delegate if the image well should accept URL string.

Parameter.Name: imageWell
Parameter.Abstract: The image well which the receiver is the delegate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the display controller should accepts string as URL of image; otherwise NO. @details Default is NO. If YES, the image well accepts string value as URL of image. This methods override image well's acceptStringDragging value.

Token.Abstract: @brief Tells the delegate that a user dragged an image into the area of image well.

Parameter.Name: imageWell
Parameter.Abstract: The image well which the receiver is the delegate.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The dragging info. @details Called whenever a user dragged an image into image well.

Token.Abstract: @brief Tells the delegate that a user dragged an image out of the area of image well.

Parameter.Name: imageWell
Parameter.Abstract: The image well which the receiver is the delegate.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The dragging info. @details Called whenever a user dragged an image out of image well.

Token.Abstract: @brief Tells the delegate that a user dropped an image into the area of image well.

Parameter.Name: imageWell
Parameter.Abstract: The image well which the receiver is the delegate.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The dragging info. @details Called whenever a user dropped an image into image well.

Token.Abstract: @brief Tells the delegate that the image well loaded the dropped image.

Parameter.Name: imageWell
Parameter.Abstract: The image well which the receiver is the delegate.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The dragging info. @details Called whenever the image well loaded the dropped image.
